1.0.0.name: wordpress/empty-postspages
1.0.0.description: Empty posts/pages still get wrapped in tags, which makes them invalid. This plugin fixes that. It looks like 2.5 no longer places empty paragraph tags in a post/page, however it does still add a br tag. For WordPress 2.5+, this plugin removes that br tag, which can be very nice when you expect to let a template do all the formatting. PHP5 Required.
